reviewText: Great Product,I love it and am glad I made the purchase. Will buy again from this seller.

No explicte scenes don't waste money , bad 3 D
minus  10 stars.....really

This is, at root, a good, old-fashioned sex comedy in the style of "American Pie".  For the most part it's more crude than witty, though there are some thoughtful moments.  The protagonist is less clueless than Jim Levenstein, and more caught up in the tug-of-war between love and lust.  As a "Category III" Hong Kong flick, the nudity is abundant and clear, and the situations risqu indeed.  Still, the sharp points are trimmed, so it's perfectly safe as a hard PG-13 or light R-rated flick.

Good comedy, really good production values, and plenty of eye candy.

I ordered this because it claimed to be "Region Free". However, when placed in my DVD player this message showed on the screen: "Playback Not Available due to Regional Restrictions". So, I shall be returning this as I had to do with an earlier purchase that claimed to be "Region Free".
If you are not bothered by subtitles and like young love conflicted with parents and sex scenes without penetration, this is a fun romantic comedy.

If your an Asian male you're probably going to laugh your butt off.  If you like American pie it's probably just as funny if you get Asian humor and on top of it all there are beautiful mostly naked Chinese girls sprinkled all through it.  I got the blu-ray version just because but it was well worth it.  Being part Chinese I could definitely appreciate the cultural aspect of this and of course since this thing was filmed close to China it was very controversial to the Chinese government.  However, I would recommend enjoying the coming of age story and learning a little about new cultures.
